Articles.Content:
(http://imgur.com/6ByUlAF)

System: Windows 8 64-Bit

This is what I got when I tried to install the Real Solar System mod in KSP 1.0.4.

What have I done wrong?

I put the textures in my RSS files.

The files are in:

C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Kerbal Space Program\Plugins

EDIT: there is a message while loading up:

Module Manager: 3 patches loaded from cache

Edited July 18, 2015 by theguyinthemines
That's the wrong place to install it. Mods go in the GameData folder. I'm sure the relevant mod release thread will have instructions in the first post.
Please follow the installation instructions in the zips' readmes or the RSS thread. They're very explicit.
